overview.en: YFS is a DeFi protocol and ecosystem that manifests decentralized finance vision by offering DeFi services to anyone with an internet connection. YFS is unique in that it provides a fully secure and transparent DeFi experience, complete with audited smart contracts and a robust token lock system. YFS provides a suite of decentralized financial services such as farming, lending, borrowing and staking. Yet YFS’s utility doesn’t stopat being a protocol. Initiatives such as the LaunchPad (a DeFi incubator) and FastSwap exchange aim to usher in the next generation of DeFi projects and applications.
overview.zh: YFS 是一个 DeFi 协议和生态系统，它通过向任何有互联网连接的人提供 DeFi 服务，体现了去中心化的金融愿景。YFS 的独特之处在于它提供了完全安全和透明的 DeFi 体验，并配有经过审计的智能合约和健壮的令牌锁系统。YFS提供一套分散的金融服务，如种田，放贷，借款和下注。然而，YFS的实用性并不仅限于成为一种协议。Launch Pad （一个 DeFi 孵化器）和 Fast Swap 交换等举措旨在迎来下一代 DeFI 项目和应用。
